title: Demoting from silver
body: Helo im attlantic roit. I was wondering if i would be demoted if i stopped playing ranked. its 28 days left in s7 and im SILVER 5 with 0 LP and i loss. My mrr is 1091 its very low for my division. Wil i get demoted to bronze 1?

replies.body: Silver doesn't have any decay to worry about. You'll only demote from Silver by losing a game with 0 lp.
